title: Exploring Glacier National Park: The Comprehensive Hiking Guide from HikinginGlacier.com
description: Glacier National Park preserves more than a million acres of some of the most spectacular scenery on Earth. With more than 740 miles of trails meandering throughout this vast park, how will you find and choose the most scenic and rewarding hikes?Exploring Glacier National Park takes all the guesswork out by focusing on the most amazing hikes, and provides you with handpicked recommendations that will allow you to make the most of your trip to Glacier.What’s in this trail guide?* Detailed descriptions for 68 day hikes that lead to tranquil backcountry lakes, roaring waterfalls, deep canyons, pristine alpine meadows and placid glaciers. Many ascend high mountain passes. All of them will lead you to extraordinary places that offer breathtaking scenery.* Various “best of” lists to help you select hikes suited to your preferences and abilities.
author: Jeffrey J. Doran
